title: says im not lvl 6+ to post on forums

replies.body: why do you have to post from ur boards profile for it to update....

Sometimes if you don't use the Boards for quite a while, your Summoner (Game) and Boards profiles fall out of sync. The reason a post like this resolves the issue is because it forces a sync to occur between these two profiles.

Happy posting! If you have any further issues, do let me know! :)
